name: Road 64
description:
Road 64 is a puzzle game for pc (windows only)

The objective is to reach the end zone with the few turn counts possible.

There are road blocks and trafic that will make the player life harder, weather conditions will also have some impact on the player's visibility.

Controls:

X - Acelerate

Z - Brake/Slow down

Arrow keys - Change direction in a intersection (The choice can be made before the intersection, it does not have to be in the intersection it self).

This game was a prototype made for a university project.
